description.value: You and your spotter are adept at watching out for one another. As long as you can see or hear each other, neither of you is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} to @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Hidden]{Hidden}, undetected, or flanking creatures of your level or lower, or to creatures of your level or lower using a surprise attack. However, they can still help their allies flank.
